data.title: Sharon Brown, Immigration Attorney at Access USA Lawyer 954-777-3800
data.text:
Immigration Attorney Sharon Brown, graduated from University of Miami, B.S., 1984 St. Thomas University, J.D., 1991; University of Miami, LL.M., 1992, is now working for Access USA Lawyer at 4200 N.W. 16th Street, Suite 306 (Lauderhill) Fort Lauderdale, FL 33313. The attorney is a member of The Florida Bar; American Bar Association; American Immigration Lawyers Association; American International Lawyers Association.. We suggest you contact other immigration attorneys nearby before making the very expensive decision.

Sharon Brown is one of the more than 7,000 immigration attorneys in United States. Before choosing Sharon Brown as your immigration attorney, you should consider whether Sharon Brown is a member of American Immigration Lawyers Association (AILA), how much he or she charges for the services, if there is any hidden attorney fee, what's the fee schedule, whether he or she has good community reputation and is able to provide a list of good references. You can also contact the Board of Professional Responsibility of the state bar, to find out if Sharon Brown has ever been placed under any disciplinary actions. If there is any such disciplinary action, avoid using his or her services. Please be aware that, though Sharon Brown's office is located at Fort Lauderdale, FL, he or she might belong to the bar association of other states.

Focus of Lawyer's Practice and Years Practice are also very important factors in your evaluation process. The more focused the lawyer's practice areas, the better service he or she could provide. Length of practice, however, can be both positive and negative for an immigration attorney. So do not make decisions solely on one or two factors. Sharon Brown has been admitted in 1992, Florida; 1999, Dominica. His or her practice areas include Family Law; Immigration.

Sharon Brown's college education includes University of Miami, B.S., 1984, law school degree was from St. Thomas University, J.D., 1991; University of Miami, LL.M., 1992, other biographical background includes .

If you already have used Sharon Brown's services or have been in contact with him or her before, we strongly encourage you to write a review of Sharon Brown. This will be very helpful to other people.

If you are Sharon Brown and still work for Access USA Lawyer, please take the listing of your firm to update the information. If you no longer work for the firm, please create a new firm profile.
